logic_summary: Appended Carhart's notch description to Pure-tone audiometry key_findings.
Corrected Right BC Threshold at 2000Hz from 15 to 20 dB HL.
Added new Acoustic Reflex Testing entry.

patch_ops.value: Left ear shows normal hearing sensitivity. Right ear shows a moderate conductive hearing loss with a significant air-bone gap across the frequency range. A characteristic Carhart's notch (artifact dip in BC threshold) is present at 2000 Hz in the right ear.

value.name: Acoustic Reflex Testing
value.key_findings: Acoustic reflexes were absent bilaterally when probing the right ear (ipsilateral and contralateral), consistent with stapes fixation. Left ear ipsilateral reflex present at 85 dB.
